title: Champion Insights: Kindred, the Eternal Hunters

replies.body: Riot the champ roster is ever increasing which is what i love about this game. However the ban rate needs to increase with the increasing roster. six bans is not enough.
8 bans would be great! Along with a way to vote to dodge champ select.

So you dodge the champ select, and the matchmaker starts searching for another 10 players but then finds the same people you were just with. This wouldn't work as you would still be paired with the same trolls. {{item:3151}}

What about an allowance of dodges, somewhat like the re-rolls in aram, you could get 1 dodge every 5 games with a maximum of 2 stored at a time, and then up the punishment timer from a base of 5 mins, so those that abuse it get like 30 mins ban or something.
This would just cause more problems for people because trolls will just wait till the last minute and then dodge making the entire champ select useless. this wouldn't work.
You can just dodge, it's just 3 lp for the first, 10 lp for the second. Doesn't affect your mmr. Simply close your client during champ select.

Yeah, the fact that we can report someone for trolling and be put in the lobby with the same person is stupid, but voting to dodge champ select would be good because it would give you the option to not continue searching for a game for 2min or so, enough time to find a new set of players
I would suggest not clicking that link.

Interesting riot mentions double ADC comps. I would have thought this was more work on mixing up lane comps.
For example, Having the adc in the jungle frees up bot lane for a juggernaut spot, assuming future reworks/champions will result in more juggernauts being released instead of just morde.

Shifting them both to death really takes away from the whole yin and yang, black and white thing they have going :/ i almost loved this character from a law perspective, but the double death thing contradicts literally everything you get by looking at this champion
